Bio

A professional Software Developer with a Bachelor’s in Engineering from the University of Alberta and a recent Certificate in Software Development from SAIT. Bringing strong communication and leadership skills from previous roles and looking to thrive in a team-based approach to breaking down business problems into real software solutions. Practical knowledge using tools such as C#/.NET, javascript/NodeJS, and SQL databases.
